upper.name: Wall Push-ups
upper.instructions: Stand facing a wall, place your hands on the wall at shoulder height, and perform a push-up while keeping your body straight.

upper.name: Hindu Push-ups
upper.instructions: Start in a downward dog position, swoop your chest towards the floor, then push forward into an upward dog position.

upper.name: Decline Push-ups
upper.instructions: Place your feet on an elevated surface like a bench and perform a push-up to focus more on the upper chest.

upper.name: Close-Grip Push-ups
upper.instructions: Place your hands closer together under your chest and perform a push-up to target the triceps more than the chest.

upper.name: Side Planks
upper.instructions: Lie on your side with your legs straight, propped up on one forearm. Lift your hips to form a straight line from head to feet, holding the position.

upper.name: Modified Plank Hold
upper.instructions: Start in a forearm plank position, keep your body straight from head to toes, and hold the position while engaging your core and shoulders.

upper.name: Arm Circles
upper.instructions: Stand with arms extended to the sides and make small circles forward, then backward, keeping your shoulders tight.

upper.name: Plank to Push-up
upper.instructions: Start in a plank position on your forearms, then push up to your hands one at a time and return to the plank. Alternate arms with each rep.

upper.name: Inchworms
upper.instructions: Start standing, bend down and walk your hands forward into a push-up position, perform a push-up, and walk your hands back to standing.
